column4: just installed ubuntu on a laptop and its my first time using wireless.... little nervous though.. is there a way to find out if the wireless is encrypted ?
well, if I'm logging into a website.. not liking the idea that my neighbors can read those passwords
but with the wireless particles flying all over the neighborhood, can't someone just pick that up and read all of it ?
not exactly but you would like to have over the air security against eavesdropping yes
